text: Hi, does anyone know the best way to send an email via the HubSpot api. Ideally I would like to pass in my own body HTML and have it send to a contact in the CRM

Hi! Amazing to have this kind of group, create tool and amazing community. I’m building a FAQ screen on my app and the company already uses HubSpot for several other solutions. I’m curious to know what I should use from an api persective to build this FAQ api, is it done through CMS?

When you say app do you mean an mobile app? If so, usually you’d use a headless CMS for something native.

However, if you’re building an IOS app you could create a really barebones theme on HubSpot and use UIWebView to display it.

There is also the option of using the HubDB API - you can expose HubDB data as public and then integrate with the read API here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/hubdb/hubdb_overview>

So build a hubdb table with fields required for your FAQ.
